viewData.name: Sony X800G 43" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Sony X800G 43" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart LED TV featuring 4K UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel, HDR10 & HLG HDR Support 60 Hz Refresh Rate / Motionflow XR 240. Review Sony X800G
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Sony X800G 43" Class HDR 4K UHD Smart LED TV. It has a 42.5" LED display and incorporates Sony's Motionflow XR 240 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. HDR10 and HLG compatibility provide a wide color gamut for compatible content. The X800G series has built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity to allow access to the Google Play store, your favorite apps, and internet-based content via its Android operating system, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other compatible smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. The Vewd web browser is also available for download through the Google Play store. With four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. A component/composite video input is also available for connecting legacy equipment, while three USB ports are onboard for connecting compatible multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
